title: Discord Bot Developer / Backend Developer
description: Designed and developed advanced Discord bots with moderation, music, leveling, and utility features.
Created turn-based and real-time multiplayer games playable directly within Discord.
Built RESTful APIs to connect bots with dashboards and external services.
Developed scalable backends using Node.js and MongoDB with optimized performance.
Implemented SQL for structured data storage, leaderboards, and game stats.
Built front-end dashboards using Next.js for user-friendly control panels.
Wrote Python scripts for automation, AI responses, and data processing.
Integrated webhooks, slash commands, and caching for smooth interaction and scalability.
highlights: Modular and extensible bot architecture used across multiple bots.
Optimized performance with rate-limiting and database indexing.
